name: W2 Websites
description:
The W2 Websites is an agency specializing in Internet solutions that span virtual stores (e-commerce), website development, creating websites, corporate portals, B2B solutions, email marketing, marketing consulting for web and web and software development.
Headquartered in São Paulo W2 operates in the market serving customers of all sizes in various states of Brazil always focusing on our main goal: bring back to the customer's investment.
